moTa: The Volvo S60 is available as a sedan. The 2018 S60 starts at $34,100 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $995. It gets EPA-estimated 22-29 MPG combined. The Volvo S60 competes against models like the Dodge Charger, INFINITI Q50, and Ford Fusion Hybrid.
